cards.title: Tattletale
powers: 1 player draws 2 cards, then discards 1 card.

cards.title: Confidence
body: At the start of your turn, each hero regains 1 HP.

flavorQuotes.text: You're trying something.{BR}I feel smugness from you,{BR}too much confidence for where you're standing.

cards.title: Constant Smile
body: At the start of your turn, {TattletaleCharacter} deals each non-hero target 1 psychic damage.
cards.flavorText: The girl turned her head,{BR}pretending to examine a jacket,{BR}so she could hide a vulpine smile{BR}that spread across her face.

cards.title: Domino Mask
body: You may use an additional power during your power phase.
cards.flavorText: Behind her simple black domino style{BR}mask, her eyes were glittering{BR}with mischief.

cards.title: Follows All the Threads
body: Play with the top card of each deck face up.
At the start of your turn, {TattletaleCharacter} deals herself 1 psychic damage.
cards.flavorText: The details on the bulletin boards{BR}became clear. They were color coded by{BR}subject, but there were threads{BR}connecting elements

cards.title: Information Overload
body: {TattletaleCharacter} may use any number of powers this turn.
Whenever {TattletaleCharacter} uses a power this turn, she deals herself 1 psychic damage.
cards.flavorText: Using her power wasn't a switch{BR}she turned on. It was letting the{BR}walls come down, letting the{BR}information start pouring in.

cards.title: It's Always in the First Place I Look
body: A player may search their deck for a card and put it into their hand, then shuffle their deck.

flavorQuotes.text: Sorry, Aidan, to squabble in front{BR}of you, but Charlotte needs to remember{BR}I don't tend to miss stuff like that.
I figured you would be.{BR}What I want to know is if you're [b]okay[/b].

cards.title: Quick Insight
body: Whenever a target enters play, you may reveal the bottom card of a deck. If you do, put the revealed card on the top or bottom of that deck and {TattletaleCharacter} deals herself 1 psychic damage.
cards.flavorText: I knew she read me ten times as well.{BR}The little shifts in her expression{BR}as she glanced at my hands, at my face.

cards.title: Reading
powers: Reveal the top 3 cards of a deck. Put 1 on the top and 2 on the bottom.
cards.flavorText: A stock ticker, a news ticker,{BR}weather, time, trending topics, social{BR}media feeds, several alert boxes for{BR}when pages relating to certain topics{BR}were updated or created.

cards.title: Spot the Flaw
body: When this card enters play, {TattletaleCharacter} deals herself 2 psychic damage.
Damage dealt by hero targets is irreducible.
At the start of your turn, destroy this card.
cards.flavorText: No vulnerable organs,{BR}hyperdurable tissues: simple organs{BR}exist at core of torso, where there{BR}is highest amount of surrounding{BR}tissues.

cards.title: Taking a Risk
powers: Put the top card of a deck into play.

flavorQuotes.text: We've always been the sort to{BR}go for the long odds.{BR}You have to do what your enemy won't predict.
We're sinking down to base insults?{BR}Trust me, I'm way better than you at that,{BR}Dr. Mengele.

cards.title: Witty Deflection
powers: Select a hero target. Until the start of your next turn, whenever that target would be dealt damage, you may redirect that damage to another hero target.
cards.flavorText: Lisa ignored Brian's question{BR}and winked at me,{BR}'Girl's gotta have her secrets.'

promoCards.title: Tattletale
powers: You may use a power.{BR}You may use a power.
incapacitatedAbilities: One hero may use a power.
Reveal the top card of a deck, then replace it.
Reveal the bottom card of a deck, then replace or discard it.

openingLines.default: Can you take this somewhere else?

promoCards.title: Tattletale
gameplay: X on this card = the number of tokens on this card.

tokenPools.name: Tattletale, Hunter of Secrets's Info Pool

powers: Reveal the top card of your deck. If it's not an Ongoing card, discard it. If it's an Ongoing card and no other cards with that name are in play, put it into play and put a token on this card. Otherwise, {TattletaleCharacter} deals herself X psychic damage and remove all tokens from this card.
If there are any tokens on this card, {TattletaleCharacter} may deal a target X psychic damage, then remove a token from this card.
incapacitatedAbilities: One hero may use a power.
Reveal the top card of a deck, then replace it.
Reveal the bottom card of a deck, then replace or discard it.
